name: Colorado Crusader
description:
A Quest To Colorado

It's not about the journey, it's about the destination.

You've found yourself in a situation no one wants to be in — positioned in the middle of Montana. Fortunately, not all hope is lost. A better life is waiting for you a few states away, in the breathtaking mountain ranges of Colorado.

Will you make it there, and at last find peace? — or will you accept your fate and dreadfully endure your remaining days in Montana. The choice is yours.
